ygData.subject: RE: Re: Undead drops in Kithicor
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The way I understood it, any nighttime undead that weren t killed hung around through daytime.  Kithicor and Rivervale are the only places for rangers and
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 2 Nov 1999, Kimes, Dean W. wrote:
>
> Strange, I've complained about dying due to all the undead spawns in Unrest
> at least a hundred times and no on ever listened, why now? I can't even
> fight the undead in Kithicor (err that were in Kithicor) and I think its
> ridiculous to complain about dying due to them. I traveled thru during the

The way I understood it, any nighttime undead that weren't
killed hung around through daytime. Kithicor and Rivervale
are the only places for rangers and druids to train if they
base out of Freeport. So putting level 40+ mobs in Kithicor
really limits the playability and locale options for certain
classes.

Of course, barbarian shamen have to go to Halas every time
they want to train...

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
